<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/73012</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>73012</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>1ea2b0e8-b1b3-44c0-a007-d04523ac5ccc#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Az egyenlet "ábrázolása"</string>
            <string language="en">Description of the equation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beschreibung der Gleichung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Description de l'équation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Descrição da equação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Descrizione dell'equazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Περιγραφή της εξίσωσης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Descripción de la ecuación</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az egyenlet bal és jobb oldalának, mint függvénynek ábrázolása, ahonnan leolvasható a megoldás.</string>
            <string language="en">Description of the left and right side of the equation as a function, from where the result can be red.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">9. osztály,  kép,  </string>
            <string language="en">9. class, picture</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beschreibung der linken und rechten Seite der 
Gleichung als Funktion, von, der das Resultat rot sein kann.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Description du côté gauche et droit de 
l'équation comme fonction, d'où le résultat peut être rouge.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Descrição do lado esquerdo e direito da 
equação como uma função, de onde o resultado possa ser vermelho.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Descrizione del lato destro e sinistro 
dell'equazione come funzione, da dove il risultato può essere rosso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Περιγραφή της αριστερής και δεξιάς πλευράς της 
εξίσωσης ως λειτουργία, από όπου το αποτέλεσμα μπορεί να είναι 
κόκκινο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Descripción de la cara izquierda y derecha de la
ecuación como función, de donde el resultado puede ser rojo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">9. Kategorie, Abbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">9. classe, image</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">9. classe, retrato</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">9. codice categoria, immagine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">9. κλάση, εικόνα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">9. clase, cuadro</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>790</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>73012</entry>

    <name>

  </manifestation>
